Connection to Wazuh manager remains active.  ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ  ‚ö° *IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED*

parameters.content:
# üö® Honeybot SOC Automation Project 
### [Full Walkthrough guide on GitHub](https://github.com/A-AlaminH/wazuh-n8n-honeybot)

## PROJECT SUMMARY
This project integrates Wazuh (SIEM) with n8n (workflow automation) to create a fully automated security response system. It detects suspicious Windows login events, enriches them with AbuseIPDB threat intel, and executes network isolation using C-LiveResponse, while sending alerts via Telegram, Slack, and ServiceNow.

## HOW IT WORKS
**Flow 1: Wazuh Alerts Enrichment**
‚Ä¢ Gets alert via a web hook then enriches them through AbuseIPDB API. then:
  - **60204** (failed logins): checks for pre-exissting Ips in sheet lookup ‚Üí Merges alert data fields ‚Üí Update/Append to Threat Data sheet
  - **92653** (Successful RDP Logins): Whitelist check ‚Üí If not whitelisted: JWT auth ‚Üí Isolate ‚Üí Alert Telegram/Slack/ServiceNow

**Flow 2: De-isolation**
‚Ä¢ Telegram /release command (chat ID verified) ‚Üí JWT ‚Üí Release agent ‚Üí Notify

**Flow 3: Scheduled Reports**
‚Ä¢ Cron (4h) ‚Üí Fetch Threat Data ‚Üí Format summary ‚Üí Send to chatops

## HOW TO USE
1. Import workflow JSON, remap credentials and Sheet IDs
2. Configure nodes: AbuseIPDB key, Threat Data & Whitelist Sheet IDs, Telegram bot token/chat ID, Wazuh IP
3. Edit Wazuh ossec.conf: Add webhook http://N8N_IP:5678/webhook/wazuh-alerts and isolation command
4. Place isolation.exe at C:\Program Files\ossec-agent\active-response\bin\

## REQUIREMENTS
Infrastructure: Wazuh 4.13.1 OVA, Win Server 2022, n8n
Services: Telegram bot, Google Cloud (Sheets API + Service Account), AbuseIPDB API key
Optional: Slack, ServiceNow
Isolation module: [C-LiveResponse](https://github.com/mitzep0x1/C-LiveResponse)

## HOW TO CUSTOMIZE
- Change detection rules: Edit ossec.conf rule_id, update Switch node
- Adjust report schedule: Edit cron in Scheduled Report node
- Add alert channels: Duplicate Telegram/Slack nodes
- Custom threat logic: Edit JavaScript merge node

## STUCK? NEED HELP?
[Full README](https://github.com/A-AlaminH/wazuh-n8n-honeybot)

Docs: [Wazuh](https://documentation.wazuh.com/current/) | [n8n](https://docs.n8n.io/) | [AbuseIPDB](https://docs.abuseipdb.com/)

### Common Issues

Webhook not firing? Check firewall port 5678 | Sheets errors? Service account needs Editor access | Import errors? Remap credentials in each node
